overview: Bumbling Navy lieutenant Tom Dodge has been given one last chance to clean up his record. But Admiral Graham, his nemesis, assigns Dodge to the Stingray, a submarine that can barely keep afloat. To add insult to injury, the Stingray is to be the enemy flagship in the upcoming war games â€¦ and to make matters even worse, Dodge's crew is a band of idiots even more incompetent that he is!
tagline: A rusty sub. A rebel commander. A renegade crew. When destiny called, they should have hung up.
title: Down Periscope
